17-959.Cold storage plants; operation and extension; tax.

The city council or village board of trustees shall levy annually a sufficient tax to maintain, operate, and extend any cold storage or refrigeration plant as provided under section 17-956 and to provide for the payment of the interest on, and principal of, any bonds that may have been issued as provided in section 17-957.

SourceLaws 1941, c. 24, ยง 3, p. 119;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 17-803;R.S.1943, ยง 17-959;Laws 2017, LB133, ยง 291.
